resources.string:
This page will install My Zooper Skin on your device.

The latest version of Zooper Widget Pro should be installed before using.

Select "Install Widget(s)" below to begin installing the apk. My Zooper Skin will then be available through Zooper.

*You will have to allow \"Unknown Sources\" to install the .apk, if you do not know how to do this, or this makes you uneasy, please pass until Zooper has fixed compatibility with Paid Apps. I take no responsibility for your device or info once Unknown Sources is enabled. To uninstall this widget completely you must uninstall both .apks.
